title: Download/install extremely slow (San Diego)
body_html:
conda install pytorch torchvision cuda80 -c soumith

cuda80 and libgcc installed fast, but pytorch goes extremely slow - it starts like 60kB/s then slows down to an unbearable ~10kB/s. I restarted it different times and got the same behavior. Any workaround for this?

Thanks,
Sal
body_text:
conda install pytorch torchvision cuda80 -c soumith
cuda80 and libgcc installed fast, but pytorch goes extremely slow - it starts like 60kB/s then slows down to an unbearable ~10kB/s. I restarted it different times and got the same behavior. Any workaround for this?
Thanks,
Sal
body:
conda install pytorch torchvision cuda80 -c soumith

cuda80 and libgcc installed fast, but pytorch goes extremely slow - it starts like 60kB/s then slows down to an unbearable ~10kB/s. I restarted it different times and got the same behavior. Any workaround for this?

Thanks,
Sal
